Booklet Contents

The course is split into three levels following the Common Entrance syllabus. Each level contains four workbooks, which cover all the grammar and vocabulary required for that level. Below is an outline of the grammar covered in each workbook.

Level 1 Book 1

  • present tense of sum
  • 1st conjugation present tense
  • nominative & accusative cases
  • 1st conjugation imperfect tense
  • 1st conjugation perfect tense
  • imperfect & perfect tenses of sum

Level 1 Book 2

  • genitive and dative cases
  • ablative and vocative cases
  • 2nd conjugation verbs
  • principal parts
  • infinitives

Level 1 Book 3

  • 2nd declension masculine nouns
  • 2nd declension neuter nouns
  • 3rd conjugation verbs
  • questions introduced by -ne

Level 1 Book 4

  • 4th and mixed conjugation verbs
  • imperatives
  • irregular verbs adsum and absum
  • positive and superlative adjectives
  • cardinal and ordinal numbers
  • personal pronouns

Level 2 Book 1

  • future tense 1st and 2nd conjugation
  • future tense 3rd and 4th conjugation
  • 3rd declension masculine and feminine nouns
  • 3rd declension neuter nouns

Level 2 Book 2

  • pluperfect tense
  • irregular verb eo
  • pronoun hic, haec, hoc
  • pronoun ille, illa, illud

Level 2 Book 3

  • pronoun is, ea, id
  • prohibitions
  • 3 declension adjectives

Level 2 Book 4

  • comparative adjectives
  • quamquam clauses
  • questions using nonne and num

Level 3 Book 1

  • present passive
  • perfect passive
  • pluperfect passive

Level 3 Book 2

  • 5th declension nouns
  • expressions of time and place
  • imperfect subjunctive
  • purpose clauses and indirect commands

Level 3 Book 3

  • future passive
  • imperfect passive
  • irregular verbs volo and nolo
  • irregular verb fero

Level 3 Book 4

  • relative pronouns
  • determinative pronouns
  • present active participles
  • perfect passive participles


For further advice on which booklets to order, please contact Rhian Harrison.
